languages.text: "И нечистую скверну, живущую в нем. Соблазны и постыдные помыслы, грызущие тебя, знаю. Знай же и ты, что в свой черед вновь предстанешь ты передо мной — и дух твой будет взвешен, но не будет одобрен, и будешь ты гнить в скорби. Но то будет после".

"And the unclean corruption that dwells within it. I know the temptations and shameful longings that gnaw at you. And thus know this: you will face me again when it is your turn, and your spirit will be weighed but found unworthy, and you will rot in sorrow. But that will come to pass later."
languages.original_text: "И нечистую скверну, живущую в нем. Соблазны и постыдные помыслы, грызущие тебя, знаю. Знай же и ты, что в свой черед вновь предстанешь ты передо мной — и дух твой будет взвешен, но не будет одобрен, и будешь ты гнить в скорби. Но то будет после".

traits.locale_text: "And the unclean corruption that dwells in it. I know the temptations and shameful longings that gnaw at you. And thus you should know that you will face me again when it is your turn, and your spirit will be weighed but found unworthy, and you will rot in sorrow. But that will be later."

"And the unclean corruption that dwells within it. I know the temptations and shameful longings that gnaw at you. And thus know this: you will face me again when it is your turn, and your spirit will be weighed but found unworthy, and you will rot in sorrow. But that will come to pass later."

languages.text: "Und die unsaubere Verderbnis, die darin haust. Ich weiß um die Versuchungen und beschämenden Begierden, die an Euch nagen. Und wisset daher dies: Ihr werdet mir wieder gegenüberstehen, wenn Eure Zeit gekommen ist, und Euer Geist wird gewogen werden und für unwürdig befunden werden, und Ihr werdet in Gram dahinsiechen. Doch dazu wird es erst später kommen."
languages.original_text: "And the unclean corruption that dwells within it. I know the temptations and shameful longings that gnaw at you. And thus know this: you will face me again when it is your turn, and your spirit will be weighed but found unworthy, and you will rot in sorrow. But that will come to pass later."

traits.locale_text: "Und die unsaubere Verderbnis, die darin haust. Ich weiß um die Versuchungen und beschämenden Begierden, die an Euch nagen. Und wisset daher dies: Ihr werdet mir wieder gegenüberstehen, wenn Eure Zeit gekommen ist, und Euer Geist wird gewogen werden und für unwürdig befunden werden, und Ihr werdet in Gram dahinsiechen. Doch dazu wird es erst später kommen."

languages.text: «Y conozco la inmunda corrupción que alberga. Sé las tentaciones y las ansias vergonzosas que te corroen. Por eso te digo que cuando llegue tu hora, te juzgaré, y tu espíritu resultará ser indigno, y te pudrirás en el pesar. Pero eso sucederá más adelante».
languages.original_text: "And the unclean corruption that dwells within it. I know the temptations and shameful longings that gnaw at you. And thus know this: you will face me again when it is your turn, and your spirit will be weighed but found unworthy, and you will rot in sorrow. But that will come to pass later."

traits.locale_text: «Y conozco la inmunda corrupción que alberga. Sé las tentaciones y las ansias vergonzosas que te corroen. Por eso te digo que cuando llegue tu hora, te juzgaré, y tu espíritu resultará ser indigno, y te pudrirás en el pesar. Pero eso sucederá más adelante».

languages.text: 「そして、その中に宿る不浄の腐敗を。私はお前を苦しめている誘惑や恥ずべき渇望を知っている。故にこのことも知っている。お前の番が来たとき、お前は再び私と向き合う。お前の魂は量られ、ふさわしくないと認められ、悲しみの中で腐っていくだろう。だが、それはまだ先のことだ」
languages.original_text: "And the unclean corruption that dwells within it. I know the temptations and shameful longings that gnaw at you. And thus know this: you will face me again when it is your turn, and your spirit will be weighed but found unworthy, and you will rot in sorrow. But that will come to pass later."

traits.locale_text: 「そして、その中に宿る不浄の腐敗を。私はお前を苦しめている誘惑や恥ずべき渇望を知っている。故にこのことも知っている。お前の番が来たとき、お前は再び私と向き合う。お前の魂は量られ、ふさわしくないと認められ、悲しみの中で腐っていくだろう。だが、それはまだ先のことだ」

languages.text: “我也见过你心灵中不洁的腐化。我明白，诱惑与可耻的渴望在啮咬着你。不要忘记，当你的大限到来时，你会再次面对我，你的灵魂会被称量，你将被视为可鄙之人，在悲痛中腐烂。不过，审判的时刻尚未到来。”
languages.original_text: "And the unclean corruption that dwells within it. I know the temptations and shameful longings that gnaw at you. And thus know this: you will face me again when it is your turn, and your spirit will be weighed but found unworthy, and you will rot in sorrow. But that will come to pass later."

traits.locale_text: “我也见过你心灵中不洁的腐化。我明白，诱惑与可耻的渴望在啮咬着你。不要忘记，当你的大限到来时，你会再次面对我，你的灵魂会被称量，你将被视为可鄙之人，在悲痛中腐烂。不过，审判的时刻尚未到来。”

languages.text: « Et la corruption impure qui l'habite. Je connais les tentations et les désirs honteux qui te rongent. Sache donc ceci : quand viendra ton tour de me faire face et que ton esprit sera pesé, mais jugé indigne, tu sombreras dans la putréfaction et le chagrin. Mais ton heure n'est pas encore venue. »
languages.original_text: "And the unclean corruption that dwells within it. I know the temptations and shameful longings that gnaw at you. And thus know this: you will face me again when it is your turn, and your spirit will be weighed but found unworthy, and you will rot in sorrow. But that will come to pass later."

traits.locale_text: « Et la corruption impure qui l'habite. Je connais les tentations et les désirs honteux qui te rongent. Sache donc ceci : quand viendra ton tour de me faire face et que ton esprit sera pesé, mais jugé indigne, tu sombreras dans la putréfaction et le chagrin. Mais ton heure n'est pas encore venue. »

languages.text: "İçinde yaşayan günahkâr yozlaşmayı da biliyorum. İçten içe seni kemiren dürtüleri ve utanç dolu arzuları biliyorum. Bundandır ki sen de unutma: Vaktin dolduğunda benimle bir kez daha yüzleşeceksin. Ruhun tartılacak fakat muvafık bulunmayacak, içine gömüldüğün kederde çürüyüp gideceksin. Lakin buna daha vakit var."
languages.original_text: "And the unclean corruption that dwells within it. I know the temptations and shameful longings that gnaw at you. And thus know this: you will face me again when it is your turn, and your spirit will be weighed but found unworthy, and you will rot in sorrow. But that will come to pass later."
